author: ryanleeschneider
content: Not sure which channel is appropriate to ask this so figured I'd start the discussion here, but am happy to move it: how will `eth_call` work in a "weak statelessness" world?  Will the caller need to provide a witness in a similar fashion to the one they provide when sending a transaction?

author: treyzania
content: The approach that the Portal Network plans to have is to keep all the storage in a big DHT with appropriate proofs so you can fetch them verifiably by traversing the DHT via your peers

author: treyzania
content: I believe the Trin client is working on an async impl of the EVM so if you try to sload a storage slot you haven't precached it will go out and find it before continuing
